= Development Widgets: Common Javascript =
    
Online Project Planner provides a number of common global functions and variables that can be used:
    
== Variables (global, set runtime) ==
 * _*BASE_URL*_ base_url from CI (no index.php)
 * _*SITE_URL*_ site_url from CI (WITH index.php)
 * _*CURRENT_PROJECT_ID*_ ID to current project
 * _*WIDGET_DEFAULT_HEIGHT*_ Default height of a widget (from backend config)
 * _*WIDGET_DEFAULT_WIDTH*_ Default width of a widget (from backend config)
 * _*WIDGET_DEFAULT_X*_ Default start x-position of a widget (from backend config)
 * _*WIDGET_DEFAULT_Y*_ Default start x-position of a widget (from backend config)y
 * _*WIDGET_SAVE_POSITIONS*_ A boolean values - enable or disable save position of a widget - also restore desktop (from backend config)

== Scripts ==

Theese scripts are always loaded when a project is opened:

 * Jquery @ http://docs.jquery.com
 * Jquery UI (complete) @ http://docs.jquery.com/Ui

=== Plugins ===

 * Window @ http://fstoke.me/jquery/window/
 * Dump @ http://plugins.jquery.com/project/Dump
 * Validate @ http://docs.jquery.com/Plugins/Validation
 * Tooltip @ http://docs.jquery.com/Plugins/Tooltip
 * dialog wrappers @ https://code.google.com/p/onlineprojectplanner/wiki/plugin_dialog_wrappers
